Identification of item,  date (if known);Riot Grrrl Publicity Collection; MSS 316; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
The Riot Grrrl Publicity Collection consists of magazine and newspaper articles published about Bikini Kill and the Riot Grrrl Movement in the early to mid 1990s.
